dia_brief.name: Tear
dia_brief.txt: I've received a private transmission from Leosocial Advancements. It would appear they have a request specifically for you lot.
This is an urgent request. Our reports indicate that Xerion will be conducting a test run of equipment they've built using technology stolen from several Leosocial transports.

Surely you can understand, publicizing news of such a security breach and open hostilities with another company is not in our best interest, so we are forced to privately seek the intervention of a third party.
We need you to launch an ambush during the equipment test and destroy whatever tech is on display.
Given your past performance assisting us, we are confident in relying on you again for such a task.
Time is of the essence - please send your response without delay.

dia_brief.name: Tear
dia_brief.txt: Private requests from manufacturers don't come by very often. It's not my choice to make, but I'd consider your options carefully.
Whether you accept or not, I'll be sure to make the proper arrangements.

dia_intro.name: Tear
dia_intro.txt: You're almost at the target. To avoid any tracing I'm cutting off your comms. Don't turn them back on until you've fleed the area.

dia_intro.name: Imo'lei
dia_intro.txt: Well, not like we'll need much guidance from here, I can already see the test site.

dia_intro.name: Xerion Staff
dia_intro.txt: What's going on here!? This is a restricted area, you people need to-

dia_intro.name: Xerion Tester
dia_intro.txt: Relax guys. Just take cover, consider this a live fire exercise.
With gear like this, it'd be a waste to just blow up some training dummies anyways.

dia_intro.name: Imo'lei
dia_intro.txt: Works for me. Wasn't planning on leaving without handing out at least 1 ass-kicking!

dia_outro.name: Imo'lei
dia_outro.txt: Hmph, not so tough after all.
Looks like the observers all ran off too. We should get outta here before they grab security or something.
Actually, hmm... this is definitely adventuring gear...
...Bingo! That fancy suit is just a bunch of scrap gear without this class chip, right Aile?

dia_outro.name: Aile
dia_outro.txt: Well, yes, but don't they want us to destroy it?

dia_outro.name: Imo'lei
dia_outro.txt: What's the difference? If we bring it back, we still took it from Xerion, and Leosocial was never gonna see it again either way.
C'mon, we're burning daylight. And if Tear asks, just say we got ripped off by a trader or something.
